rules_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
When Starsea Leviathan enters, draw a card, then pursue Wonder. [i](Reveal a basic land or Wonder card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“I am of the first world visited by the Wonderlands, centuries ago. It has confided in me.”[/i]
